channel.title: Apple on MEM v ENNBEE - Battles with Modern Device Management
channel.description: Recent content in Apple on MEM v ENNBEE - Battles with Modern Device Management
channel.copyright: Â© 2024 Nick Benton, MEM v ENNBEE

item.title: Custom Backgrounds for macOS New and Classic Microsoft Teams Apps
item.description: With the availability of the new Microsoft Teams client for macOS, we should build upon an existing script to deploy backgrounds, and update it to support not just the new version but the classic version as well.

item.title: Revisiting macOS National Cyber Security Centre Security Settings
item.description: With the improved support for macOS devices in Microsoft Intune, it’s time we revisited how to secure macOS devices aligned the National Cyber Security Centre guidance.

item.title: Deploying Teams Backgrounds to macOS Devices
item.description: What happens when a stranger on the Internet asks you to look at something they’ve got a problem with? Here we are, looking at how to deploy Microsoft Teams Backgrounds to macOS devices.

item.title: Assigning Intune Mobile Apps Quickly and Consistently
item.description: No one, and I mean no one, really wants to manually and individually assign Mobile Apps to Users or Devices in Intune in their 100’s, so we should find a solution for this bulk assignment approach.

item.title: Updating Apple Operating System Compliance Policies
item.description: Apple devices shouldn’t be exempt from Operating System compliance policies, and these policies should share the same fate as Windows ones, and be updated monthly in line with update release cycles.

item.title: Device Migration and Automated Device Enrolment Profile Assignment
item.description: Migrating iOS/iPadOS device to Microsoft Intune shouldn’t be a headache, and assignment of Automated Device Enrolment profiles with Apple Business Manager integration isn’t the exception.

item.title: Creating and Assigning App Categories the Smart Way
item.description: What about assigning App Categories, do you want to be manually updating hundreds of Apps with categories? Let’s make one laborious task, less laborious, with a hacky PowerShell script.

item.title: macOS National Cyber Security Centre Security Settings in Intune
item.description: If you’ve ever had to implement baseline security settings, whether this be Centre for Internet Security, Cyber Essentials, or National Cyber Security Centre, you’ll probably have encountered some level of pain when it comes to non-Microsoft devices, as the guidance, is, well, complicated. Here we unpick these settings for macOS devices.
